name: sinon
description: JavaScript test spies, stubs and mocks.
author: Christian Johansen

scripts.build-ie: mkdirp pkg && node scripts/license.js > pkg/sinon-ie-${npm_package_version}.js && $(npm bin)/copy lib/sinon/util/timers_ie.js >> pkg/sinon-ie-${npm_package_version}.js && $(npm bin)/copy lib/sinon/util/xhr_ie.js >> pkg/sinon-ie-${npm_package_version}.js  && $(npm bin)/copy lib/sinon/util/xdr_ie.js >> pkg/sinon-ie-${npm_package_version}.js
scripts.build-main: mkdirp pkg && node scripts/license.js > pkg/sinon-${npm_package_version}.js && echo '(function () {"use strict";' >> pkg/sinon-${npm_package_version}.js && $(npm bin)/browserify -s sinon lib/sinon.js >> pkg/sinon-${npm_package_version}.js && echo '}());' >> pkg/sinon-${npm_package_version}.js
scripts.build-server: mkdirp pkg && node scripts/license.js > pkg/sinon-server-${npm_package_version}.js && echo '(function () {"use strict";' >> pkg/sinon-server-${npm_package_version}.js && $(npm bin)/browserify -i './lib/sinon/util/core.js' -s sinon lib/sinon/util/fake_server_with_clock.js >> pkg/sinon-server-${npm_package_version}.js && echo '}());' >> pkg/sinon-server-${npm_package_version}.js
scripts.build: npm run build-main && npm run build-server && npm run build-ie && npm run copy-main && npm run copy-server && npm run copy-ie
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run publish
